issue.title: Add version to javascript call
issue.body:
**Original author :** Portier Thomas

In order to prevent cache client problems, it would be usefull to add easysdi version to javascript loads as : 
editMetadata.js?version=4.3

comments.body:
**Original author :** Villemagne Jérôme

TC agree on this enhancement :
- this has to be done on all javascript files of easySDI (external libraries included but not Joomla's)
- technical implementation has to be discussed further

**Original author :** Villemagne Jérôme

Thomas will propose an implementation.

**Original author :** Portier Thomas

You can close this ticket Hélène?

**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

Why was it rejected ?

**Original author :** Portier Thomas

Because Yves did it on https://forge.easysdi.org/issues/1244
